attributes.action: provide affordable second London accomodation for MP's linked to seat held
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A complex of 659 1 bedroom studio apartments should be built to accomodate MP's when in London. 
1 apartment for each seat held in the House of Commons.
These apartments are linked to the seat the MP holds and when an MP loses the seat, they move out and the replacement MP receives the apartment.
This will save the government spending of taxpayers money millions of pounds a year, and help to make MP's expenditure even more transparent.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
